name: Frag Grenade
description: A throwable impact grenade that deals less damage the further you are from the explosion.

name: Thermite Grenade
description: A throwable item that leaves a line of fire which burns the enemy over a short period of time.

name: Arc Star
description: A throwable shuriken that sticks on impact and damages and stuns the enemy when it explodes. The impact damage is higher when sticking it to a enemy with a shield.
